issue.subject: Assignation as an option
issue.description:
Following this feature #749 :

The menu entry "Gestion/Historique des assignations" in resources list page is still visible after installation of the feature.
If you go to administrator and set the value for this option, every thing is well render.
The default value of the option (deactivate the feature) seems to be not well handle for the specified menu entry.

details.name: description
details.old_value:
Following this feature #749 :

When assignation is an option, the menu entry "Gestion/Historique des assignations" in resources list page is still visible:
It must be removed.
details.new_value:
Following this feature #749 :

The menu entry "Gestion/Historique des assignations" in resources list page is still visible after installation of the feature.
If you go to administrator and set the value for this option, every thing is well render.
The default value of the option (deactivate the feature) seems to be not well handle for the specified menu entry.
